spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall layout resembles the 2D plan (bedroom top-left, living/dining central-left, kitchen to the right, toilet near top-center/right), but several spatial mismatches exist: the foyer zone at the entry is not clearly modeled (entry appears to open directly into living area), the entry door position shifts from bottom-right (2D) to near bottom-center (3D), and the utility/duct cluster around the toilet does not match the 2D plan’s right-side arrangement. Some internal wall/partition alignments between living–foyer–kitchen differ, causing proportion and circulation deviations.

structural_fidelity.notes: Key structural partitioning is inconsistent with the plan: the foyer separation and its bounding walls are effectively missing/merged into the living area; the toilet/utility/duct adjacency on the right side appears altered (utility placement and/or the narrow shaft/closet geometry does not cleanly correspond to the 2D duct + utility layout). Door embeddings exist but some are in the wrong wall segment due to shifted partitions. No major additional full rooms are added, but a narrow extra enclosure/shaft-like space is present beyond what is clearly defined in the plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Major furniture types generally match (bedroom bed, living sofa, dining table, kitchen counters). However, placement does not fully reflect the 2D symbols (living/dining arrangement and balcony edge condition are simplified), and some built-ins (wardrobe/cabinet locations) differ. Scale is generally plausible, but the merged foyer/living area makes the living furniture read oversized relative to the intended entry zone.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean isometric presentation with good lighting and generally clean geometry. Minor issues: some openings/windows are hard to read clearly, and a few elements (small shaft/extra enclosure, bottom-wall opening) reduce orthographic faithfulness. Camera and overall composition are solid.

detected_errors.description: Foyer space (4'6"x3'10") is not properly represented as a distinct area; entry appears to open directly into living/dining.
Main entry door location is shifted: 2D shows it at the bottom-right into the foyer; 3D places it closer to the bottom-center and into the main space.
Utility/duct cluster placement around the toilet is inconsistent with the 2D plan (utility expected to the right of kitchen with clear duct adjacency; 3D reads as rearranged near/above the toilet).
A narrow extra enclosed/shaft-like space on the far right appears more room-like in 3D than the 2D plan’s simple duct indication.
Living/dining to entry/foyer proportions are distorted due to missing foyer partitioning, making the main space read larger and circulation different than the plan.
Some internal wall alignments between living–kitchen–toilet corridor do not match the 2D wall segments, shifting door embeddings and passage geometry.
Window/opening placement is unclear/inconsistent: a bottom-wall opening/window appears in 3D that is not clearly indicated in the 2D plan at that location.
